title: Longfellow House Washington's Headquarters National Historic Site: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons      Longfellow House - Washington's Headquarters National Historic Site is open for the 2016 season!The Visitor Center is open from 9:30-5:00, Wednesday-Sunday. Fifty-minute, ranger-led tours start in the Visitor Center at 10:00, 11:00, 12:00, 1:00, 2:00, 3:00, and 4:00. Tours are filled on a first-come, first-served basis. Twenty-minute express tours of the first floor only begin at 10:30, 11:30, 12:30, 1:30, 2:30, 3:30, and 4:30. Outside of the house, walking tours are offered Wednesday through Saturday at 2:30, tours of the historic landscape begin Wednesday through Saturday at 11:15 and 3:45, and a talk in the formal garden starts at 1:00 each Saturday.Please call (617)876-4491 for reservations if your group is more than 8 people, preferably at least two weeks in advance. Special tours, lectures, and other events may be found on the Calendar or Like us on Facebook to stay up-to-date with the happenings at Longfellow House - Washington's Headquarters NHS. The site's archives are open for researchers by appointment. Call (617) 491-1054.  The gardens and grounds are free and open to the public year-round from dawn to dusk every day.
